title: Fabric gradle 未找到来源
author: 狡诈师
txt_content:
兴致勃勃地学下MOD开发，可就死在第一步  好极了，老天似乎在劝退我

代理**，离线包都试过，结果都是如下：
不过话说很奇怪，看视频人家没有这样步骤
据说是网络问题（我可是翻过墙）？

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* Where:
Build file 'F:\fabric\xxx\build.gradle' line: 2

* What went wrong:
Plugin [id: 'fabric-loom', version: '0.4-SNAPSHOT'] was not found in any of the following sources:

- Gradle Core Plugins (not a core plugin, please see https://docs.gradle.org/5.5.1/userguide/standard_plugins.html for available core plugins)
- Plugin Repositories (could not resolve plugin artifact 'fabric-loom:fabric-loom.gradle.plugin:0.4-SNAPSHOT')
  Searched in the following repositories:
    BintrayJCenter
    Fabric(https://maven.fabricmc.net/)
    Gradle Central Plugin Repository

* Try:
Run with --stacktrace option to get the stack trace. Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output. Run with --scan to get full insights.

* Get more help at https://help.gradle.org

BUILD FAILED in 1s
22:11:02: Task execution finished.复制代码

replies.author: seer007100
replies.txt_content: 你能夠把你的 build.gradle 給我看看嗎？

replies.author: 狡诈师
replies.txt_content:
seer007100 发表于 2020-8-3 01:40
你能夠把你的 build.gradle 給我看看嗎？
没事了，我已经解决了，我把它指向c盘那里而不是指向f盘那里的.gradle

因为默认使用了f盘（）所以没找到目标，提示没有来源，反而输送在c盘
